name: react-bond
description: react-bond is a library for building cross-platform lightweight desktop apps with the React.

scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && tsc src/index.ts --outDir lib --target esnext --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --jsx react --sourceMap true --declaration true
scripts.build:scripts: tsc src/scripts/hot.ts --outDir lib/scripts --noImplicitUseStrict --target esnext --module commonjs --esModuleInterop true --jsx react

author: Filip Paul≈Ø
